name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2018
description: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2018 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10 Processor: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 768 display capable of running 32-bit color or higher Storage: 250 MB available space
